mapper.insert: insert into pms_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer.no})
mapper.select:
select b.no, b.title, b.cdt, b.vw_cnt, b.like_cnt, m.no as writer_no, m.name as writer_name from pms_board b inner join pms_member m on m.no=b.writer
where b.title like concat('%', #{value},'%') or b.content like concat('%', #{value},'%') or m.name like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by b.no desc
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.cdt, b.vw_cnt, b.like_cnt, m.no as writer_no, m.name as writer_name from pms_board b inner join pms_member m on m.no=b.writer where b.no = #{value}
